divination_cards.name: Divination Cards
divination_cards.description: Farming specific maps for valuable divination cards

mechanics.overview: Divination cards are items that can be collected and turned in for a specific reward.
mechanics.farming_method: Farm specific maps where the cards drop. Check the divination card locations for details.
tips: Use high quantity and rarity on maps for better drop rates
Consider using Atlas passives that enhance divination card drops
Some cards only drop in specific areas or from specific monsters

heist.name: Heist
heist.description: Running Heist contracts and blueprints for specific rewards

mechanics.overview: Heist is a league mechanic where players steal valuable items from secure facilities.
mechanics.farming_method: Run Heist contracts and blueprints, focusing on high-value reward rooms.
tips: Level up your Rogues to improve their abilities
Focus on Blueprints with valuable reward rooms like Currency, Divination Cards, or Uniques
Use Rogue's Markers efficiently by prioritizing high-value targets

expedition.name: Expedition
expedition.description: Running Expedition encounters for valuable artifacts and logbooks

mechanics.overview: Expedition involves unearthing artifacts and logbooks by strategically placing explosives.
mechanics.farming_method: Run Expedition encounters in maps and collect logbooks for bigger rewards.
tips: Target specific remnants based on your farming goals
Be careful with remnant modifiers that can make encounters more difficult
Sell valuable artifacts to Expedition vendors or other players

cluster_jewels.name: Cluster Jewels
cluster_jewels.description: Crafting high-demand cluster jewels with specific notables

mechanics.overview: Cluster Jewels are special jewels that can be socketed in the passive skill tree to add new passive clusters.
mechanics.crafting_method: Use currency items like Chaos Orbs, Fossils, or Harvest crafts to roll desired notables.
tips: Focus on jewel bases that are in high demand for meta builds
Check which notables are most valuable for each jewel type
Consider the number of passive points required as fewer is generally better

influenced_items.name: Influenced Items
influenced_items.description: Crafting influenced items with specific mods

mechanics.overview: Influenced items can roll special modifiers associated with specific endgame bosses.
mechanics.crafting_method: Use currency items, fossils, or Harvest crafts to roll desired influence mods.
tips: Check which influence combinations are most valuable for specific item slots
Use Awakener's Orbs to combine two influenced items with desired mods
Consider using Harvest crafts for targeted modifications
